metadata.title: CVE-2015-8105 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in program/js/app.js in Roundcubewebmail before 1.0.7 and 1.1.x before 1.1.3 allows remote authenticatedusers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the file name in adrag-n-drop file upload.

criterions.comment: roundcube: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
